shortDescription: Commander, this installation is a vital part of Combine research efforts, and we need to ensure the enemy doesn't destroy it. We believe the opposing forces are a mercenary unit hired by our erstwhile allies in the Free Worlds League, and their intent is to disrupt the important work being done here. Your job will be to hold them off until they exhaust themselves, at which point we'll launch our own counterattack.
longDescription: This seems simple enough, which makes me nervous. I don't like when we're asked to defend "research" without knowing what the research is.

contractObjectiveList.title: Defend the Draconis Combine Research Base

objectiveList.title: Defend Target Buildings
objectiveList.description: Defend Targeted Base Structures from Attackers

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Enemy Vanguard
objectiveList.description: Destroy the enemy vanguard force, the first wave.

objectiveList.title: Keep All Target Structures Standing
objectiveList.description: Optional objective to keep ALL target structures intact.

objectiveList.title: Hold Out
objectiveList.description: Objective for tracking the time left in the mission. While the player it told to Hold Out for Reinforcements

objectiveList.title: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses
objectiveList.description: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses in order to take control of them.

objectiveList.title: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance
objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance

objectiveList.title: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance
objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance

dialogueContent.words: To be completely honest with you, I haven't the faintest idea what kind of research goes on here. Nevertheless, a credible threat has been made. Your opposition is a mercenary company using the rather grandiose name "[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGrayDeath],Gray Death Legion]]."
Huh. I've heard of them. Made a name for themselves on the Lyran and Draconis border. Their commander is supposed to be a hot-shit tactician.

Imagine me rolling my eyes dramatically. At any rate, my people tell me there are at least two lances of enemy 'Mechs on the surface, advancing toward your position. I have inbound aerospace support, so all you need to do is hold out until it arrives.
Keep the facility intact, and hold out for the cavalry. Shouldn't be a problem, Shugo Yamaguchi.

Commander, this is Grayson Carlyle. That was a hell of an ass kicking. Glad we were in salvaged 'Mechs. Listen, I don't have a bone to pick with you; I just need what's in that facility. I've got reinforcements landing shortly and— [static]

Mercenary Commander: this is the Draconis [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreISF],Internal Security Force]]. We are interdicting this world in pursuit of the wanted criminal Grayson Carlyle. Do not attempt to enter orbit, or you will be fired on.
What the— Boss, I've got multiple lock-ons coming from the surface. They've got me in their crosshairs. What the hell is this?
Commander, will someone please tell me what's going on down there? I can't contact my people, and the JumpShip captain isn't answering— [static]
Darius? We just lost the comms relay signal from the system's JumpShip. Either it was destroyed, or it just jumped out.
Additionally, our communications are being disrupted by a ground installation. We can relay messages through the Leopard, but only over short distances.
What the hell is— Combine forces, we're on your side. Stand down, we're the good guys!
Shit! Boss, they just fired a PPC off the Leopard's bow. I'm going nap-of-the-earth to try to shake them.
I don't want to say "I told you so," but… I think we just got double-crossed. They're after Carlyle, but I bet we're acceptable collateral damage.
Commander, we need to pull Carlyle's ass out of the fire if we're going to figure out what the hell is going on. Let's get to him before the Combine does.

Commander, this is Grayson Carlyle. That was a hell of an ass kicking. Glad we were in salvaged 'Mechs. Listen, I don't have a bone to pick with you; I just need what's in that facility. I've got reinforcements landing shortly and— [static]

Mercenary Commander: this is the Draconis [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreISF],Internal Security Force]]. We are interdicting this world in pursuit of the wanted criminal Grayson Carlyle. Do not attempt to enter orbit, or you will be fired on.
What the— boss, I've got multiple lock-ons coming from the surface. They've got me in their crosshairs. What the hell is this?
Commander, will someone please tell me what's going on down there? I can't contact my people, and the JumpShip captain isn't answering— [static]
Darius? We just lost the comms relay signal from the system's JumpShip. Either it was destroyed, or it just jumped out.
Additionally, our communications are being disrupted by a ground installation. We can relay messages through the Leopard, but only over short distances.
What the hell is— Combine forces, we're on your side. Stand down, we're the good guys!
Shit! Boss, they just fired a PPC off the Leopard's bow. I'm going nap-of-the-earth to try to shake them.
I don't want to say "I told you so," but… I think we just got double-crossed. They're after Carlyle, but I bet we're acceptable collateral damage.
Commander, we need to pull Carlyle's ass out of the fire if we're going to figure out what the hell is going on. Let's get to him before the Combine does.
We're in position! All engineers have disembarked from the personnel carriers. The APCs will scatter and support you. Keep the turrets online and we'll keep firing.
Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.
Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.
Commander, a target building has been demolished. Ensure the integrity of the remaining buildings.
Only one building left standing, Commander. If we don't protect it, the mission fails.
Mercenary Commander, we've received word of the assault on your position. Reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.
Commander, on this outing we have some additional support from our employer.
They have point defenses set up around the base. However, they are offline.
We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.
Escort them safely to the generators, and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good luck!
